## Load packages
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
```

## Load data
```{r}
setwd("~/Desktop/Repos/ScallopRSA2021")

mayCTD <- read.csv("./data/salinity/may_salinity_CTD.csv")
may_measured <- read.csv("./data/salinity/may_salinity_measured.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = mayCTD, aes(x = Station, y = BottomSalinity)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_point(data = may_measured, aes(y = Salinity, col = "red")) +
  ylim(30, 35) +
  scale_color_discrete(labels = "bottle\nsample") +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.title=element_blank())
```
